name: Gold Defenders
description:
Search around for gold in dungeons loot it using the minecart! The old minecart is rickety and needs to be cleaned to prevent it from rusting.

Lots of ghosts haunt the old dungeons, so fight your way through the dungeons!

Play as 4 playable characters, those being:
- Tapa, The Gentleman Cat who wields a spear and can stun nearby enemies.

- Mei, The Agile Healer that can dash around levels and heal other players.

- Rago, The Shapeshifting Hunter who can corner enemies with slow projectiles and go big and small.

- Paou, The Regenerating Ranger with faster health regen, a boomerang, and can set up forcefields.

The game is multiplayer focused, but singleplayer play is possible.

At the moment, you can go through 4 different levels, each with a unique way to keep you on edge, and face off against a boss in the last one!
